LandingPage.title: Experience the power of ChurnBot
LandingPage.description: This is the landing page of our application. Explore the features and functionalities we offer.

hero.title: Share key metrics with your team in real-time
hero.subtitle: Sync your MRR, subscriptions, churn and more with Slack or your internal dashboard.

features.heading: Everything you need for transparent metrics
features.subheading: Sync your key data and give your team full visibility in real time.

metrics.title: Track Core Metrics
metrics.description: Monitor MRR, ARR, churn, and new subscriptions in one place.

teams.title: Empower Your Team
teams.description: Share live insights without adding extra meetings or dashboards.

slack.title: Slack Integration
slack.description: Get automatic updates directly in your team’s Slack channels.

realtime.title: Live Data Sync
realtime.description: Connect Stripe and other tools to sync data in real time.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.subheading: Get started in minutes and keep your team aligned effortlessly.

connect.title: Connect
connect.description: Link Stripe and other data sources securely.

sync.title: Sync
sync.description: Automatically pull live metrics with zero setup.

share.title: Share
share.description: Send updates to Slack or share your internal dashboard.

align.title: Align
align.description: Keep your team focused with transparent, real-time data.

integrations.heading: Seamless Integrations
integrations.subheading: Connect your favorite tools like Stripe, Slack, GitHub, and more in minutes.

cta.heading: Ready to unlock transparency?
cta.subtitle: Start sharing key SaaS metrics with your team today — free trial included.

ErrorBoundary.title: You’ve hit a dead chart
ErrorBoundary.description: Looks like this page doesn’t exist — just like some of our KPIs last quarter.

Dashboard.title: Welcome to the Dashboard
Dashboard.description: This is your dashboard where you can manage your settings and view your data.

Settings.title: Settings
Settings.description: Adjust your preferences and settings here.

ProfileForm.fileLimitExceeded: File size exceeds the limit of 5MB.

SuccessAlert.title: Workspaces created successfully!
SuccessAlert.description: Your workspace has been created. To get the most out of it, make sure to connect the necessary integrations in the Integrations tab.
